title: The Permanent Emergency with Dr. Aaron Kheriaty
itunes:title: The Permanent Emergency with Dr. Aaron Kheriaty
description:
Joe Biden says that "the pandemic is over," but he just extended the Covid state of emergency. Dr. Aaron Kheriaty says we should get used to it — Covid has paved the way for new, permanent "emergency" powers for government, dressed up in the guise of public health. These powers won't just let government impose vaccines, but also control where you go, what you eat, and even what you think. Dr. Kheriaty joins Charlie to lay out this Orwellian possible future from The New Abnormal: The Rise of the Biomedical Security State.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
